text: Sodium chlorate is a chemical compound. It is a crystalline solid. It is a strong oxidizing agent. Its chemical formula is NaClO3. It contains sodium and chlorate ions. It is made by electrolysis of a hot sodium chloride solution. It is used as a herbicide. It is toxic because of its oxidizing properties. It is mostly known to be used as non-selective herbicide. == Related pages == *Potassium chlorate *Perchlorate *Chlorate *Sodium chlorite Category:Sodium compounds Category:Chlorine compounds
title: Sodium chlorate
